title: API Documentation
description: Generate comprehensive API documentation with examples
prompt:
Generate comprehensive API documentation:

[PASTE CODE HERE]

Format: [OpenAPI/Swagger/Markdown]

Required Sections:
1. Overview: Purpose, base URL, version, authentication
2. Endpoints: Method, path, parameters, responses, examples
3. Data Models: Object definitions, field descriptions
4. Authentication: Flow, token format, headers
5. Error Handling: Error codes and troubleshooting
6. Code Examples: Multiple languages
7. Changelog: Version history, breaking changes
example: Document a RESTful API for a task management system
